Package edu.carroll.cs389application.service

Interface ImageService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageServiceImpl
public interface ImageService
Defines methods for managing images uploaded by users.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    Retrieves the images uploaded by the given user.

  • Method Details

    • saveImage

      void saveImage(ImageForm imageForm, Login user) throws IOException
      Saves an image and its metadata for the given user.
      Parameters:
      imageForm - the form data for the image to be saved
      user - the user who uploaded the image
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the image

    • saveImageFile

      void saveImageFile(UserImage userImage, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws IOException
      Saves the image file for a given UserImage.
      Parameters:
      userImage - the UserImage for which to save the file
      file - the MultipartFile containing the image file data
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the image file

    • pullImages

      List<org.springframework.data.util.Pair<InputStream,String>> pullImages(Login user) throws IOException
      Retrieves the images uploaded by the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose images to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of pairs of input streams and file names for the user's images
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while retrieving the images

    • validateFile

      ImageServiceImpl.ErrorCode validateFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Validates the given file to ensure that it is a valid image file.
      Parameters:
      file - the MultipartFile to validate
      Returns:
      the validation error code

    • loadUserImagesbyUserID

      List<UserImage> loadUserImagesbyUserID(Login user)
      Retrieves the images uploaded by the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose images to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of UserImage objects representing the user's images
